body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.12 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for multiple icon sizes in winemenubuilder.
Improvements to the help browser.
Initial stab at DOSBox integration.
Various MSI fixes.
Some fixes to the Wine debugger.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
